entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 7:40 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: E 42 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with freezing rain early this evening. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
